dict.acceptation: 真的；真实的，现实的；事实上的；真诚的；

sent.orig: Real-time myocardial contrast enhancement imaging (Real-time MCE) is a new kind of myocardial perfusion detection technology.
sent.trans: 实时心肌声学造影(Real-time MCE)是一项最新的MCE技术，它在观察心肌灌注的同时显示室壁运动，其中包含闪烁显像技术具有定量分析MBP的潜力。

sent.orig: And applied the technique of real-time PCR to analyzing the mRNA level expression of ACOl.
sent.trans: 运用real-time PCR技术对果实后熟特异表达基因ACO1进行表达分析。

sent.orig: Real estate agencies include real estate appraisal, real estate consulting and real estate agent.
sent.trans: 房地产中介行业包括房地产价格评估、房地产咨询和房地产代理。

sent.orig: Leads □the superior □guest room thing, achieves the real thing□, real credit real value.
sent.trans: 倡导优质客房用品，做到真品质，真信用，真价值。谢谢啦！

sent.orig: Real estate law is not the forte of real estate attorneys and real estate agents only.
sent.trans: 房地产法律并非专长房地产律师和房地产经纪人只。
